item.description:
We start by crossing  the 11th street bridge off Avenue "A" in in Turners Falls, taking the second left onto G Street, and driving about .4  miles to meet up in the the parking lot at the end.  We will walk the west side of the Power Canal canal along Migratory Way to see the various birds that rest in the waters ahead of the power station. Bring your camera.

This walk is on flat, paved roads the whole way.  We may decide to return on the path under the power lines.   This is an on-leash walk, with an off-leash option if we walk the power line trail.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot at the end of G street

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Migratory Way - through the Patch to see the birds
